projects.title: Budgeting Mate
projects.description: A minimalist Expense tracker app with many currencies and gentle animations for a focused, stress-free experience.

projects.title: Sphere Cast
projects.description: A Super Simple Weather App that shows the weather conditions around the world easily. Uses the OpenWeatherAPI.

projects.title: SecureKey Gen
projects.description: A super simple yet powerful password generator which can generate very strong and secure passwords in a click. It has many options to customize your password as much as you can.

projects.title: Sapphire Notes
projects.description: A sleek and elegant note-taking app designed for clarity and focus. Quickly capture, organize, and revisit your most important ideas.

projects.title: Fluid Type
projects.description: Test and improve your typing speed and accuracy with this clean typing test application. Track your words-per-minute (WPM) and see your progress over time.

projects.title: Encrypt 2000
projects.description: A fast and efficient URL shortener that turns long, unwieldy links into short, shareable ones. Features a clean interface for quick link creation and management.

projects.title: Make a Site!
projects.description: An interactive tool for beginners to build their first landing page. Choose from pre-made components and see your website come to life in real-time.

projects.title: Science at Home!
projects.description: An interactive web platform that simulates key science concepts. Explore physics, chemistry, and biology through engaging, hands-on digital simulations.

projects.title: Markdown Rectifier
projects.description: A live Markdown to HTML converter with a split-screen preview. Write your Markdown on one side and instantly see the correctly formatted HTML output on the other.

projects.title: CPU on the Web
projects.description: A browser-based emulator that simulates the architecture and instruction set of a basic CPU. A deep-dive project into the fundamentals of computer architecture.

projects.title: Hacking the Web!
projects.description: An educational hacking simulator that demonstrates common web vulnerabilities in a safe environment. Learn how attacks work to better protect your own applications.

projects.title: Pencil Editor
projects.description: A lightweight, in-browser code playground for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Instantly test your front-end ideas and see the results render live on the page.

projects.title: Powerz Docs
projects.description: A clean, browser-based word processor for creating and formatting documents with ease. Features essential text styling tools for a distraction-free writing experience.

projects.title: Cracking Algorithms
projects.description: An interactive algorithm visualizer that brings complex data structures to life. Watch step-by-step animations to build an intuitive understanding of how they work.

projects.title: Build My Resume
projects.description: A user-friendly resume builder that helps you create a professional document in minutes. Fill out a simple form, choose a template, and instantly download your resume.

projects.title: Journalism on the Web
projects.description: A private, secure digital notebook for your daily thoughts, reflections, and ideas. Organize your entries and enjoy a simple, elegant interface designed for personal journaling.
